longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Cyprus must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card: 
 - issued to nationals of Cyprus;

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Cyprus will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Cyprus are expected to hold
  their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Travel documents issued by the part of Cyprus not controlled
  by the Government of Cyprus are not accepted
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required. 

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis. malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, is very limited and may exist from May to October in
  villages of the Evrotas delta area in Lakonia district in
  agricultural areas with large migrant populations. There is
  no risk in tourist areas. Recommended prevention in risk
  area: A.
